name: FNF: Monochrome Project [V.1.5]
description:
A Monochrome Fangame from the Friday Night Funkin' Mod "FNF Lullaby"

Built on Mono Engine, a Friday Night Funkin' Engine made from Scratch (quite literally) powered by TurboWarp!
